DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test efficacy 1-Hz repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation ( TMS ) pre-supplementary motor area treatment obsessive compulsive disorder . Additionally , study aim identify mechanisms action TMS potential biomarkers predictor treatment response .
DOC.brief_title: Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( TMS ) Obsessive Compulsive Disorder ( OCD ) : Mechanisms Biomarkers
DOC.criteria: 1 . 1865 year age . 2 . Proficient English . 3 . A diagnosis primary OCD ( determine SCID ) . 4 . YaleBrown Obsessive Compulsive Scale total score ≥ 16 . 5 . Normal ( correct ) vision . 6 . Stable medication regimen medication free ≥ 12 week prior study ; benzodiazepine free ≥ 2 week . 7 . Righthanded ( Edinburgh Handedness Inventory Short Form total score ≥ 61 ) 8 . Able give inform consent . 1 . Current history neurologic psychiatric disease ( e.g. , mental retardation , dementia , brain damage , cognitive impairment ) would interfere ability engage TMS 2 . Psychopathology appropriate treatment ( e.g. , manic episode psychosis ) 3 . Substance abuse dependence current within last six month use illicit drug prescribe , indicated urine drug screen and/or clinical inference . 4 . Use benzodiazepines anticonvulsant within 2 week prior study ( ruled urine drug screen ) . 5 . Use Tricyclic Antidepressants ( e.g . Clomipramine ) . 6 . Use psychotropic medication ( e.g. , SSRIs ) allow provide dose stable > 12 week . 7 . Documented resistance 4 valid pharmacological trial 2 different medication class ( e.g . SSRIs TCAs ) . 8 . Previous exposure TMS . 9 . Major/chronic medical condition . 10 . History head injury result prolonged loss consciousness and/or neurological sequela . 11 . Prior neurosurgical procedure . 12 . Metal body , metal injury eye . 13 . History seizure . 14 . Implanted pacemaker , medication pump , vagal stimulator , deep brain stimulator , TENS unit , ventriculoperitoneal shunt 15 . Pregnancy ; breastfeed nursing ; woman childbearing pregnancy test ( rule urine βHCG ) conduct prior study . 16 . Currently Cognitive Behavioral Therapy ( CBT ) . 17 . Diagnosis primary sleep disorder primary insomnia , narcolepsy , sleep apnea , shift work sleep disorder others . Sleep disorder insomnia hypersomnia secondary depression OCD permit .
